author: Aliya Chaudhry
title: How to watch movies with friends online
description: You can download extensions to help host movie nights with your friends online. Apps like Netflix Party and Metastream add a live text chat to your stream while Scener and TwoSeven let you video chat while watching a movie or TV show.
